# yakumo.tw

> Personal technical blog focused on amateur radio, GNSS, and related notes.

Site: https://yakumo.tw/
Language: zh-TW
Sitemap: https://yakumo.tw/sitemap.xml
RSS: https://yakumo.tw/index.xml
Robots: https://yakumo.tw/robots.txt

## Primary Sections
- Posts: https://yakumo.tw/posts/
- GNSS: https://yakumo.tw/gnss/
- Other Notes: https://yakumo.tw/other/
- About: https://yakumo.tw/about/me/

## Crawling Guidance
- Public pages may be crawled and indexed.
- Prefer canonical URLs for indexing.
- Prefer sitemap and RSS for discovery.
- Respect robots.txt directives and crawl politely.
